title: Afa Isorni noa, Swithw-dhwrwmni dera
lyrics:
Aa . . . . . . . . . . Aa . . . . . . . . . . -2
Afa Isorni noa, Swithw-dhwrwmni dera
Shrang alari jwngblaobai thathwng
Jwngni sibithiliao -2
(A)
Wi menglinai fwr, fwi nwngswrw fwi
Wi unkhwinaifwr, fwi nwngswrw fwi -2
Khwmsi lamanifrai ongkharnan fwi
Iswrni raijwao bahafw lafwi -2
(B)
Jiu hwsartnanwi dhwrwm sibinangwn
Gwsw hwsartnanwi swithw lakhinangwn -2
Aros thanangwn firi-firi
Mwngwn oblasw bwrni jhwri -2
